system.description: When you talk about your home, roll + Freak.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: You inadvertently reveal more about yourself than you planned; tell them a secret or vulnerability you haven’t shared with Earthlings before now.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
Choose one.

  • confess a flaw of your home; add 1 Team to the pool
  • mislead them about your home; take Influence over them
  • describe the glories of your home; clear a condition

success.label: Success!
success.value:
Choose two.

  • confess a flaw of your home; add 1 Team to the pool
  • mislead them about your home; take Influence over them
  • describe the glories of your home; clear a condition

system.choices:
During the conversation, you:

  • Confess a flaw of your home; add 1 Team to the pool
  • Mislead them about your home; take Influence over them
  • Describe the glories of your home; clear a condition
